[[Category: R]]
<bash>
$ mkdir ~/Library/R/
$ cd ~/Library/R/

$ R CMD INSTALL -l ~/Library/R/ seqinr_1.0-6.tar.gz
> library(seqinr, lib.loc="~/Library/R/")


# or you can
$ R CMD INSTALL -l seqinr seqinr_1.0-6.tar.gz
> library(seqinr, lib.loc="~/Library/R/seqinr")

</bash>

Don't have to specify '''lib.loc''' if the variable '''$R_LIBS''' is already set in the '''~/.bashrc''' like this:
<bash>
R_LIBS=~/Library/R/
export R_LIBS 
</bash>
